column4: is there a way to upgrade to the 2.6.18 kernel without losing the Ubuntu boot screen?

Nothing really... better question; Is there a way to get Synaptic Package manager to upgrade to 2.6.18 or do I have to do it manually (I don't mind doing it manually, but I'd rather Ubuntu KNOWS that I've upgraded the kernel...
think there is a document on how to make kernel packages
